Script.name: MuMeM.PkgMgr.EventHandler.packageUnInstall
Script.script:
function MuMeM.PkgMgr.EventHandler.packageUnInstall(eventName, package) if not MuMeM.PkgMgr.isInitialized then return end
MuMeM.PkgMgr.log(f"[REMOVE] package {package} removed") MuMeM.PkgMgr.setPackageStatus(package)
if #MuMeM.PkgMgr.packageInstallTree == 0 then MuMeM.PkgMgr.displayPackages() end end
